entities.name: he
entities.description: The main character in the story, listening hard and warning others not to talk.

entities.name: Hermione
entities.description: A person who cast various charms over them, including Muﬄiato, Muggle-Repelling, and Disillusionment Charms.

entities.name: Sneakoscope
entities.description: An object that was not moving.

relationships.description: He asked Hermione if she cast the Muﬄiato charm over them, indicating a relationship between them where one person casts charms on another.
He looked around at the Sneakoscope, indicating that he observed or noticed it.
Hermione cast the Muﬄiato charm over them.
